snippet: A Costa Rican diplomat kidnapped on Sunday and held for ransom in the latest high-profile abduction of a foreign envoy in Venezuela was freed Tuesday.
abstract: Costa Rican diplomat Guillermo Cholele, the latest foreign envoy to be abducted in Venezuela, is freed and in good health.
lead_paragraph: A Costa Rican diplomat kidnapped on Sunday and held for ransom in the latest high-profile abduction of a foreign envoy in Venezuela was freed Tuesday.

headline.seo: Costa Rican Diplomat Freed in Venezuela
headline.main: Costa Rican Diplomat Freed in Venezuela
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: Costa Rican Envoy Is Freed
